title: 06/21/2021 - HOUR 1 - Old School Suns, Chris Broussard, Net Loss
itunes:title: 06/21/2021 - HOUR 1 - Old School Suns, Chris Broussard, Net Loss
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, Colin describes the three qualities that make the Phoenix Suns so hot to handle. Also, FS1 NBA analyst and FOX Sports Radio host Chris Broussard offers his insight on the ongoing NBA playoffs. Plus, Colin examines the messy situation regarding the Philadelphia 76ers and their fading star Ben Simmons as well as why the Brooklyn Nets' regular season issues caught up to them in the playoffs.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
